PRACTICE PRACTISE
Usage: practice [skill or spell name]
Practice is the way you improve your spells and skills. You can only do so in your guild, where your guildmaster can help you train. Type "practice <skill>" to improve your abilities while in your guild. You can only practice a certain amount for each level you gain. Unused practice sessions will accumulate for use in future levels.
If you type practice anywhere other than in your guild, you will get a list of all of the spells and skills you know and your level of proficiency at each.
